message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you would find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $110.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it.
Hi Bob, I understand your position. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $95 for the product.
